   Eric Litke
   By Eric Litke April 9, 2020

Did Supreme Court vote remotely to “deny Wisconsin voters their right to vote
remotely”?

"Conservative Supreme Court Justices vote remotely to deny Wisconsin
   voters their right to vote remotely," the April 7, 2020, post says,
   accompanied by pictures of the five men comprising the conservative
   majority of the U.S. Supreme Court.

Our ruling

   A Facebook post says conservative Supreme Court justices voted remotely
   "to deny Wisconsin voters their right to vote remotely."
